title: Linqor
description: Linq extensions for ordered sequences. Provides better perfomance in comparison to standard extensions. Provides Concat, Distinct, Except, GroupBy, Intersect, Join, GroupJoin and Union.

packOptions.summary: Linq extensions for ordered sequences. Provides better perfomance in comparison to standard extensions. Provides Concat, Distinct, Except, GroupBy, Intersect, Join, GroupJoin and Union.
packOptions.releaseNotes: Project now targets dotnet core netstandard
